comment: It's an OK game. It's not very difficult, passed the first two dozen levels in the past fifteen minutes or so. The physics could use a huge upgrade though, the balls interact with each other in very unrealistic ways

comment: Really fun its just that sometimes the game freezes when i beat a level then when i close it and open it, it erases all the levels ive beat

title: Nice game, open source, no permissions needed
comment: A good app, asks for no permissions.

title: Hard to say...
comment: Haven't seen the higher levels yet but the first five were pretty easy once I realized you have to push AGAINST the balls motion to slow it down... / Bug/issue: After each level it has U choose quit or continue.  Both choices dump you back to the menu and if you choose quit then it won't unlock the next level. So there's no reason to ever choose quit - they should remove that option or change what it does.

title: Nice game, but it has stability issues
